wikipedia_page.main: Roy Lewis (born 29 June 1948) is an English cricketer. He played 38 first-class and 14 List A matches for Surrey between 1968 and 1973.

response: Roy Lewis (6 November 1913 – 9 October 1996) was an English writer and small press printer.

* The Death of God, a Curious Narrative Dream Dreamed By Roy Lewis in the Year MCMXLIII (1943) When He Was Living in Dibrugarh in Assam and on Waking Recollected and Written Down By Him (Keepsake Press, 1959)
